sys_remote_update_set.description: A simple UI Script that lets you reload the form by pressing the Alt/Option key twice (quickly).
sys_remote_update_set.name: ReloadForm

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_7b56f07d55e04140ccce5f6af0e45756
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>Pressing Alt/Option Twice will reload the current frame.</description><global>true</global><name>ReloadForm</name><script>//Reloads the form when Alt key is double-pressed
//You must press the key twice within 300ms
//To change the key that is used, simply update event.keyCode = 18 to whatever key code you want
//A list of key codes can be found here:  http://www.javascripter.net/faq/keycodes.htm

var dblCtrlKey = 0;
Event.observe(document, 'keydown', function(event) {
  if (dblCtrlKey != 0 && event.keyCode == 18) {
    location.reload();
  } else {
    dblCtrlKey = setTimeout('dblCtrlKey = 0;', 300);
  }
});</script><sys_created_by>cwhaley</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2013-04-05 19:43:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>7b56f07d55e04140ccce5f6af0e45756</sys_id><sys_mod_count>42</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>cwhaley</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2013-04-05 21:33:24</sys_updated_on><u_order/></sys_ui_script></record_update>
